HOW IT WORKS

Build connections and confidence through structured practice

Solo Practice

Learn how to start conversations with real-life prompts. Practice breaking the ice in coffee shops, giving feedback at work, making small talk at events. Prepare for different speaking situations in private 5-minute sessions.

Partner Matching

Create meaningful connections by practicing with others. Break the ice with pre-selected topics that make conversations feel natural. Build confidence through real interactions in a safe, structured environment.

Track Progress

See your streak, total sessions, and time spent practicing. Watch your confidence grow as you master different types of speaking situations and build stronger connections.

PREPARE FOR ANY SITUATION

Master different types of speaking and build confidence in every conversation

Social Events

Break the ice at parties, networking events, and social gatherings

Workplace

Give feedback, present ideas, and communicate with confidence

Personal

Build deeper connections in dating, friendships, and relationships

Daily Life

Order coffee, ask for directions, make small talk naturally
